## BoxStyleProps interface

Style properties for box content

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BoxStyleProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.color.md) | [FlowColor](./scribing.flowcolor.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Color of the box |
|  [condition?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.condition.md) | string \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The script condition that must evaluate to true for the box to be displayed |
|  [inline?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.inline.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Determines whether the box shall be rendered inline |
|  [interaction?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.interaction.md) | [Interaction](./scribing.interaction.md) \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The interaction that shall be invoked when the box is clicked |
|  [variant?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.variant.md) | [BoxVariant](./scribing.boxvariant.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The style variant of the box. |
